summary.span: 資料繫結清單控制項，允許自訂版面配置，方法是在清單中為所顯示的每個項目重複指定的範本。

span.span: A data-bound list control that allows custom layout by repeating a specified template for each item displayed in the list.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [資料繫結Data Binding](#data_binding) - [範本Templates](#templates) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項是基本的樣板化資料繫結清單。The control is a basic templated data-bound list. 它有沒有內建的配置或樣式，因此您必須明確宣告所有版面配置、 格式化和樣式標記內控制項的樣板。It has no built-in layout or styles, so you must explicitly declare all layout, formatting, and style tags within the control's templates. 控制項可讓您在範本之間分割標記。The control allows you to split markup tags across the templates. 若要建立資料表，使用範本，包括的開始資料表標記 (``) 中，單一資料表資料列標記 (``) 中，和資料表結尾標記 (`
`) 中。To create a table using templates, include the begin table tag (``) in the , a single table row tag (``) in the , and the end table tag (`
`) in the . 控制項沒有任何內建的選取功能或編輯的支援。The control has no built-in selection capabilities or editing support. 您可以使用程序由範本產生至控制項的控制項事件的事件。You can use the event to process control events that are raised from the templates to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[驗證伺服器控制項語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## 資料繫結Data Binding 控制項提供兩個屬性，以支援資料繫結。The control provides two properties to support data binding. 若要將資料繫結至任何實作的集合介面 (例如、 ，或陣列)，或介面，請使用屬性來指定資料來源。To bind data to any collection that implements the interface (such as a , a , or an array), or the interface, use the property to specify the data source. 當您將屬性，您必須手動撰寫的程式碼來執行資料繫結。When you set the property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding. 自動繫結代表資料來源控制項，資料來源的控制項設定屬性資料來源使用的控制項。To automatically bind the control to a data source represented by a data source control, set the property to the of the data source control to use. 當您將屬性，控制項自動繫結至指定的資料來源控制項第一次要求。When you set the property, the control automatically binds to the specified data source control on the first request. 因此，您不需要明確地呼叫方法除非您已變更的資料相關的屬性控制項。Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the method unless you have changed data-related properties of the control. A控制繫結其和任一個資料模型宣告和參考其屬性或資料來源所指定的控制其屬性。A control binds its and to either the data model declared and referenced by its property or the data source control specified by its property. ， ，和無法資料繫結。The , , and are not data-bound. 如果設定控制項的資料來源，但未傳回任何資料時，控制項呈現和與任何項目。If the control's data source is set but no data is returned, the control renders the and with no items. 如果資料來源是`null`、就不會轉譯。If the data source is `null`, the is not rendered. ## 範本Templates 至少每隔控制項必須定義。At a minimum, every control must define an . 不過下, 表說明其他選擇性範本可以用來自訂外觀的清單。However, other optional templates described in the following table can be used to customize the appearance of the list. |範本名稱Template name|描述Description| |-------------------|-----------------| ||定義的內容和配置的清單中的項目。Defines the content and layout of items within the list. 此範本為必要項。This template is required.| ||如果有定義，決定的內容和替代的配置 （以零為起始奇數索引） 的項目。If defined, determines the content and layout of alternating (zero-based odd-indexed) items. 如果未定義，用。If not defined, is used.| ||如果定義，則會呈現項目 （與替代項目） 之間。If defined, is rendered between items (and alternating items). 如果未定義時，就不會轉譯為分隔符號。If not defined, a separator is not rendered.| ||如果定義，判斷內容和清單標頭的配置。If defined, determines the content and layout of the list header. 如果未定義時，就不會轉譯標頭。If not defined, a header is not rendered.| ||如果定義，判斷內容和清單頁尾的配置。If defined, determines the content and layout of the list footer. 如果未定義時，就不會轉譯的頁尾。If not defined, a footer is not rendered.| ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web 站台專案：[下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192873)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192873). 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用兩個簡單頁面上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use two simple controls on a page. 屬性用來指定資料來源控制項。The property is used to specify the data source for the control. 第一個資料表中會顯示其項目，第二個以逗號分隔的清單會顯示其項目。The first displays its items in a table; the second displays its items in a comma-separated list. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Repeater Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Repeater Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Repeater Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Repeater Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的資料來源控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the data source for a control. 屬性設定為屬性控制項用來擷取資料。The property is set to the property of the control used to retrieve the data. 載入頁面時，控制項自動繫結至指定之資料來源控制項和資料顯示給使用者。When the page is loaded, the control automatically binds to the data source specified by the control and the data is displayed to the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[Repeater.DataSourceID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Repeater.DataSourceID/CS/repeater.datasourceidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Repeater.DataSourceID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Repeater.DataSourceID/VB/repeater.datasourceidvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 將 控制項和它的所有子控制項繫結至指定的資料來源。

span.span: Binds the control and all its child controls to the specified data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法所指定的資料來源繫結屬性控制項。Use the method to bind the data source specified by the property to the control. 當您繫結至資料來源控制項，資料來源中的資訊會顯示在控制項。When you bind a data source to the control, the information in the data source is displayed in the control. 方法也常用於同步處理資料來源和資料更新資料來源中的資訊之後，清單控制項。The method is also commonly used to synchronize the data source and a data listing control after information in the data source is updated. 這可讓資料清單控制項中也會更新資料來源中的任何變更。This allows any changes in the data source to also be updated in a data listing control. 如果資料來源的控制項由指定屬性，您不需要明確地呼叫方法。If the data source for the control is specified by the property, you do not need to explicitly call the method. ASP.NET 呼叫這個方法會自動將繫結至指定的資料來源控制項控制項。ASP.NET calls this method automatically to bind the specified data source control to the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫自訂的伺服器中的方法控制，好讓它一定會引發自訂的資料繫結事件伺服器控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always raises a data binding event in a custom server control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定要填入的資料來源控制項。Use this property to specify the source of data to populate the control. 可以是任何集合，例如來存取資料庫， ，或陣列，或物件。The can be any collection such as a for accessing databases, a , or an array, or an object. 當您將屬性必須以手動方式撰寫程式碼繫結至資料來源。When you set the property you must manually write the code to bind to the data source. 如果資料來源指定屬性包含多個資料來源，請使用屬性來指定要繫結至控制項的特定來源。If the data source specified by the property contains multiple sources of data, use the property to specify the specific source to bind to the control. 例如，如果您有多個資料表，您必須指定要繫結至控制項的表格。For example, if you have a with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control. 您已指定資料來源之後，請使用資料來源繫結至控制項的方法。After you have specified the data source, use the method to bind the data source to the control. 或者，您可以使用自動繫結到資料來源控制項所代表的資料來源的屬性。Alternately, you can use the property to automatically bind to a data source represented by a data source control. 當您將屬性，控制項自動繫結至指定的資料來源控制項。When you set the property, the control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 您不需要撰寫程式碼，明確地呼叫方法除非您以動態方式變更的內容控制項。You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the method unless you dynamically change properties of the control. 如果兩個指定的值屬性和屬性，ASP.NET 會不能夠解析資料來源和就會擲回。If values are specified for both the property and the property, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and a is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定的控制當載入的頁面。The following example demonstrates how to specify the of the control when the page is loaded. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取資料來源屬性控制的控制項應擷取其資料來源使用。Use the property to access the property of the data source control that the control should use to retrieve its data source. 資料來源所參考的控制項屬性可以是實作任何控制項介面。The data source control that is referenced by the property can be any control that implements the interface. 資料來源控制項必須有兩種做為相同的命名容器參考它的控制項或中的父控制項控制項。The data source control must exist either in the same naming container as the control that references it or in a parent control of the control. 當您指定的值屬性，控制項繫結至指定的資料來源控制項。When you specify a value for the property, the control binds to the specified data source control. 您不需要撰寫程式碼，明確地呼叫方法。You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the method. 或者，您可以使用屬性來指定要繫結至值的來源控制項。Alternatively, you can use the property to specify the source of values to bind to the control. 資料來源必須是集合中實作介面 (例如或物件) 或介面。The data source must be a collection that implements the interface (such as the or object) or the interface. 當您將屬性，您必須撰寫程式碼以執行資料繫結。When you set the property, you must write the code to perform the data binding. 如果兩個指定的值和屬性，ASP.NET 不能解析資料來源和擲回例外狀況。If values are specified for both the and properties, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and an exception is thrown. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to the property of a control. 載入頁面時，控制項繫結至資料來源所指定控制項和資料顯示給使用者。When the page is loaded, the control binds to the data source that is specified by the control and the data is displayed to the user. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來建立範本，可控制如何中的項目顯示控制項。Use this property to create a template that controls how items in the control are displayed. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[驗證伺服器控制項語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## Examples 下列範例說明如何使用簡單控制項來顯示資料表的項目。The following example illustrates how to use a simple control to display a table of items. 請注意，使用來顯示資料來源中的每個項目。Notice the use of the to display each item in the data source.
